semantics.description: ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution. TRIGGER: first point in the interval if (relocation) is true and any point in the interval where (relocation) becomes true (from false). REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at some time point between (and including) the trigger and the end of the interval.
semantics.ft: ((LAST V (((! relocation) & ((! LAST) & (X relocation))) -> (X ((! LAST) U (fgfr_relocate & fgf_bound))))) & (relocation -> ((! LAST) U (fgfr_relocate & fgf_bound))))
semantics.CoCoSpecCode: (H(not (relocation)) or not (SI((relocation and ZtoPre(not (relocation))),not ((fgfr_relocate and fgf_bound)))))
semantics.ftExpanded: ((LAST V (((! relocation) & ((! LAST) & (X relocation))) -> (X ((! LAST) U (fgfr_relocate & fgf_bound))))) & (relocation -> ((! LAST) U (fgfr_relocate & fgf_bound))))

rationale: By pressing the optimistic button, with probability 1/2, M will award G 10 credits, while with probability 1/2, M will take 8 credits from G.
fulltext: if !optimisticButton System shall with probability >0.5 eventually satisfy bigG = bigG - 8

semantics.description: ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution. TRIGGER: first point in the interval if (! optimisticButton) is true and any point in the interval where (! optimisticButton) becomes true (from false). REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at some time point between (and including) the trigger and the end of the interval.
semantics.ft: ((LAST V (((! (! optimisticButton)) & ((! LAST) & (X (! optimisticButton)))) -> (X ((! LAST) U (bigG = (bigG - 8)))))) & ((! optimisticButton) -> ((! LAST) U (bigG = (bigG - 8)))))
semantics.ftExpanded: ((LAST V ((optimisticButton & ((! LAST) & (X (! optimisticButton)))) -> (X ((! LAST) U (bigG = (bigG - 8)))))) & ((! optimisticButton) -> ((! LAST) U (bigG = (bigG - 8)))))

rationale: when a software failure is detected, the system will be self-healing within 2 min with probability 0.99
fulltext: upon FailureDetection system shall with probability > 0.99 within 2 minutes satisfy selfHealing

semantics.description: ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution. TRIGGER: first point in the interval if (FailureDetection) is true and any point in the interval where (FailureDetection) becomes true (from false). REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at some point with distance <= 2 from the trigger (i.e., at trigger, trigger+1, ..., or trigger+2). If the interval ends sooner than trigger+2, then RES need not hold.
semantics.ft: ((LAST V (((! FailureDetection) & ((! LAST) & (X FailureDetection))) -> (X ((F[<=2] selfHealing) | (F[<2] LAST))))) & (FailureDetection -> ((F[<=2] selfHealing) | (F[<2] LAST))))
semantics.CoCoSpecCode: H((OT(2, 2, ((FailureDetection and ZtoPre(not (FailureDetection))) and not (selfHealing))) => OT(1, 0, (ZtoPre(false) or selfHealing))))
semantics.ftExpanded: ((LAST V (((! FailureDetection) & ((! LAST) & (X FailureDetection))) -> (X ((F[0,2] selfHealing) | (F[0,1] LAST))))) & (FailureDetection -> ((F[0,2] selfHealing) | (F[0,1] LAST))))

rationale: At least 95% of the sessions (from login to logout) shall require at most 1 second of computation time. ( the probability to reach state 11 (Logout) within 1 s is greater than 0.95)
fulltext: System shall with probability >= 0.95 within 1 second satisfy s=11

semantics.description: ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution. TRIGGER: first point in the interval. REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at some point with distance <= 1 from the trigger (i.e., at trigger, trigger+1, ..., or trigger+1). If the interval ends sooner than trigger+1, then RES need not hold.
